item.title: Preventing system sleep
item.description: This feature is available for: macOS Windows Linux with systemd (logind) Thereâ€™s a global parameter called prevent-sleep that you can set to true, and resticprofile will prevent your system from idle sleeping. Please note: it will not prevent a sleep if the system is running on batteries it will not prevent a sleep triggered by a user action: using the sleep button, closing the laptop lid, etc.
